VPD_NOMINALSYNOPSIS: Katy, an 85-year-old with dementia, was reported after disappearing post a hiking trip on an island. Known for her frequent victimization and also as a repeated perpetrator, her disappearance prompted concern among her colleagues. They highlighted her pattern of getting lost in a cave before, which raises alarms about her safety. Given her fragile mental state and lack of direction, it's crucial to address her ongoing distress. Consent has been given for this report due to her vulnerability and history.
VPD_WELLBEINGCOMMENTS: Katy experiences ongoing distress due to repeated victimization.
VPD_NOMINALSVIEW: Katy acknowledges her situation and consents to database input.
